de.samdev.absgdx.framework.util.dependentProperties

Class DependentProperty

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.samdev.absgdx.framework.util.dependentProperties.DependentProperty
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BooleanProperty, ColorProperty, ConstantBooleanProperty, FloatProperty, IntegerProperty, StringProperty

    public abstract class DependentProperty
extends java.lang.Object
    A dependent Property. Dependent properties form a tree, each property (except the root) depend on an other one. And each property is only "active" when the parent node is active

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      DependentProperty dependsOn
      The property this one depends on (can be null)
      java.lang.String name
      The name of the property

      java.util.List<DependentProperty> getChildren() 
      void getTreeDebugString(java.lang.StringBuilder b, int depth)
      Creates an entry in the debug tree
      boolean isActive()
      Gets if this Property is enabled (the property and all parents must be "on")

      is called when an other property is created with this one as parent
